name: Anime Solitaire
description:
This is a classic solitaire, known as the Klondike. The rules are familiar to everyone.
Lay out the cards from the ace to the king in four stacks, shifting the cards on the system:the smaller card falls on the big, alternating red and black suits.
The game ends when all the cards are laid out. You will need to concentrate your best to earn maximum points.
"Anime Solitaire" is a great puzzle game where you can not only train your mind, logical thinking, memory and attention, but you can also just relax.
Due to pleasant relaxing music and hot anime beauties you will have a great time playing the updated version of the familiar game.



Enjoy the game! The good old "Solitaire" is always relevant.

Features:

- Classic rules and familiar gameplay.
- Simple interface and easy control.
- Sexy girls in anime style.
- Atmospheric relaxing music.
- Two kinds of decks.
- 100 achievements.
